Well this is just painful to read. I dunno if she fell in love with the third or not, but I'm more positive that she's actually glad her husband found her, which is why she's so calm. She will accept anything the husband decide, but the most important part for her is the slap she gave to him. Now it's all up to him to decide, what will he do? Tbh, I don't mind they made up as long as the author didn't use bullshit twist like him being a cuck or the wife continuing her cheating. @Kami Nana I think you're mistaken if you read my words as me justifying cheating. I clearly stated that cheating is still wrong. It's just that @TvManga2020 oversimplified the story as "wife cheated cuz she saw husband fap to porn" and also even made a farfetched assumption as to why husband was fapping in the first place, so I had to describe in detail how the wife's situation was according to her story. In regards to the points you've raised, you're free to think of whatever cheaters are in your dictionary. But as for the story alone, I think I've said enough to cover what these two chapters have in store for now. That was her situation and it was her impetus to cheat. She never talked about this with her husband until it was too late, so I called this a failed marriage. Anything beyond that is for the final chapter to cover and for readers to have their own take and theories.

Anyway...going by the summary...husband is most likely going to pull out divorce papers...why else confront her about it? I also get the feeling the reason why she's so calm is that last guy has claimed her heart and now she doesn't want to be with the husband anymore. So it's going to be a clean break, I bet.

@DrinksandDame Being sexless for four years is still no excuse. A cheating whore is a cheating whore. Moreover, knowing Japanese work ethic, the poor guy was probably working himself to death trying to give the whore a stable life and was just too tired to bang afterward. As for the porn...well, fapping to porn takes less energy than actual sex. Two...where was the wife when he was actually in the mood? Anyway, any marriage counseller will tell you that so called "neglect" is no reason to cheat. What lead to their failed marriage is her inability to stay true and their inability to just fucking talk about their problems(mostly hers). More importantly, this whore is a cheater and will always be one. Fact is cheaters are three times more likely to cheat than normal. Them being sexless was just a convenient excuse for her to use.

@DrinksandDame Thank you for the detailed explanations, I know it's difficult getting the author's intent through a summary but I think you did an excellent job explaining the story, with details and a bit of the themes involved. I look forward to this getting a translation since the author has some pretty solid stories with themes in the background that are more vanilla. From the way you explained it, I predict that something about the interaction with the older gentlemen and maybe something about his past, helps her find resolve in hopefully fixing her marriage, since we can presume the husband is in the prime of his career working really hard and the older gentlemen is the final result of unhealthy working habits. Who knows? I have some hope for both wife and husband to fix their marriage, but it could also end in their separation by both amicably or one or the other. I would like to read the story as a whole and determine what I think afterwards! You're awesome for this!

--douche for his actions. She thinks of it as her punishment after all. And anyway, at that time she wasn't quite ready to spill everything to H. It was until he met the 3rd man that she apparently managed to find the conviction to do so.  TBC. Sorry if my summary was a little too casual. Again, I can't give justice to how the author wrote the dialogues. Im not sure if this will get an actual Eng translation but they can probably do a better job at this than I did. Next up is the final chapter where we will know how W ended up becoming such a calm person despite all the things she's done behind her man's back.

--Ch 2 takes us a month after her first meet up. As much as W was filled with regrets, she was up for a second time. Next up is the douche. W was too quick to accept his request all because of his "my wife passed away" story. As the illustration suggests, she was drugged and was forced into sex. She was definitely resisting at first but douche got her in the palm of his hand. W felt like this is karma's revenge on her for cheating. Her body may have given in, but her words still got some bit of fight to it. She showed disgust to douche but in return, he called her out for being a disgusting cheater herself. Quite a pair, indeed. The kiss was the one that sealed it off. She let her heart and body be dominated until he was satisfied. End of scene. Later on, Douche apparently was wiped away from the site probably because of his fake story and overall doucheness. Back to present, H was like "That's some serious crime there. You should've talked to me about it." But W wasn't resenting--

--that she met with 3 people in a span 3 months. Despite being late to realize and regret things, H was trying to fully grasp how things ended up like this so he listened to her stories. Again, Ill just lightly summarize these. First man was a college student. A nice person. When they were doing the deed, man had a tough time getting it hard to which W responded with the succ. Definitely there was a sense of guilt but she found that she can still satsify someone. No matter how immoral her action was, to her it was what saved her. Man suggested to meet again, but she was afraid that her heart might fall at some point. Husband was furious at how this all looks like she just wants to play pretend as a lovey dovey couple. But she then revealed that the 2nd man she met was a lying, violent piece of shit man. The worst kind. (end of Ch 1)--

This is a summary for both chapters. A final Ch has yet to come btw. Failed Marriage. That's what this is about. Story starts of with the couple in the middle of argument. With 6 years under their belt, the married couple finally had the cracks in their relationship out in plain view. Husband(H) apparently had Wife(W) investigated and it turned out that she has been cheating on him. To H's surprise, W calmly admits it and proceeds to explain why she did. Her monologues are pretty well written that my summary can't give justice to it, so Ill just explain it lightly. Basically, it's been 4 years since they banged. No matter how much she invites him, he always seems to be tired. She believed that their love hasnt changed, it's just that there's no sex anymore. When she found out that he be fapping behind her back, she realized that he wasn't rejecting sex, he was rejecting her as a woman. Carrying such a heavy thought in mind, she decides to meet men thru a dating app. she revealed--

@Diddo - Why is NTR popular in Japan? Lots of reasons. Japan's "cheating" subculture. "Endure it" subculture. "Can't be helped" subculture. Divorce considered disgraceful. Custody of children not sharable. Very conservative society. Which makes women abandoning their roles/duties as wives/mothers for pleasure, super taboo. Toss in a nation full of salarymen feeling oppressed, overworked, and underappreciated? NTR heaven.
